mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSysPostNoTmpr Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ POST_NO , NEW_POST_NO , RD_ADDR_BASE_ADDR , LNM_ADDR_BASE_ADDR , AUD_CD , SIGNGU_CD , ROAD_NM , MJR_BULD_NO , MNR_BULD_NO , SUD_NM , AUD_NM , LEGALRI_NM , MJR_LNM , MNR_LNM , SIGNGU_BULD_NM , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM SYS_POST_NO_TMPR WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteSysPostNoTmpr Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM SYS_POST_NO_TMPR WHERE 1 = 1
